#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;
int dictionary[] = {0,9,18,27,36,45,54}; 
int getNumLength(int num){
    string s;
    stringstream out;
    out << num;
    s = out.str();
    return s.length();
}
bool isEncore(int k,int num){
    bool res = false;
    string s;
    stringstream out;
    out << k;
    s = out.str();
    
    int sum=0;
    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
        int j = s[i] - '0';
        sum += j;
    }
    if(k + sum == num)
    return true;
    
    return false;
}
int main(){
    int testCases;
    cin>>testCases;
    for(int i=0;i<testCases;i++){
    int result=0;
        int num ;
        cin>>num;
        int j = dictionary[getNumLength(num)];
        int k = num - j;
        for(k;k<num;k++){
            if(isEncore(k,num))
               { result = k;
                 break;
               }
        }
        if(result == 0){
            cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
        }else{
            cout<<k<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
